properties.name: redis.host
properties.description: Address of the redis server's host.

properties.name: redis.port
properties.description: connection port of the redis server.

properties.name: notification.subject
properties.description: Subject of the newly added file notification mail.

properties.name: notification.text
properties.description: Text message of the newly added file notification mail.

properties.name: notification.to
properties.description: Address of the receiver of the the notification email.

properties.name: notification.from
properties.description: Address of the sender of the notification email.

properties.name: file-system.directory
properties.description: Name of the storage directory of the app.
